title: Calgary Stampede
summary: The Calgary Stampede is an annual rodeo, exhibition, and festival held every July in Calgary, Alberta, Canada.  The ten-day event, which bills itself as "The Greatest Outdoor Show on Earth",[3] attracts over one million visitors per year and features one of the world's largest rodeos, a parade, midway, stage shows, concerts, agricultural competitions, chuckwagon racing, and First Nations exhibitions. In 2008, the Calgary Stampede was inducted into the ProRodeo Hall of Fame.[4]
